about.title: About WebABC
about.subtitle: Leading in Digital Marketing and Web Development with over a decade of successful experience
about.missionText: At WebABC, we guide businesses through their digital transformation journey with our expert team and up-to-date knowledge. Our main goal is to create lasting value for our clients through innovative and results-oriented solutions.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: Success Stories and Case Studies
caseStudies.description: Explore our case studies to see the journey from initial challenges to measurable results. Each case study demonstrates our commitment to delivering value.
caseStudies.downloadHint: Want to learn more about our approach and results?

ecommerceCase.title: 200% Increase in Online Sales with SEO Optimization
ecommerceCase.challenge: A home appliance online store had quality products but low traffic and sales. The main issue was lack of proper search engine optimization and poor user experience.
ecommerceCase.solution: Our team designed a comprehensive strategy including technical site optimization, content structure improvement, information architecture correction, and creation of dedicated landing pages for popular products.
ecommerceCase.results1: 200% increase in online sales over 6 months
ecommerceCase.results2: 150% improvement in organic traffic from Google
ecommerceCase.testimonial: Partnering with WebABC was one of our best business decisions. The results of our site optimization far exceeded our expectations.
ecommerceCase.imageAlt: Online store sales growth chart after SEO optimization by WebABC
ecommerceCase.resultsImageAlt: Keyword ranking improvement results for online store after SEO implementation by WebABC

wordpressCase.title: Brand Relaunch with Custom WordPress Website
wordpressCase.challenge: A beauty brand needed a complete digital transformation of their outdated website that was difficult to update and wasn't generating leads or sales.
wordpressCase.solution: We developed a custom WordPress website with a premium theme, integrated e-commerce functionality, and implemented a content strategy focused on product education and beauty advice.
wordpressCase.results1: 75% increase in average time on site
wordpressCase.testimonial: The WebABC team delivered a website that perfectly represents our brand identity. The site is not only beautiful but also user-friendly and has significantly boosted our digital presence.
wordpressCase.imageAlt: WordPress website redesign for beauty brand showing responsive layout on multiple devices
wordpressCase.resultsImageAlt: Analytics dashboard showing improvements in user engagement metrics after website redesign

localSeoCase.title: 500% More Appointments Through Local SEO Strategy
localSeoCase.challenge: A dental clinic was struggling to attract local patients despite offering excellent services. Their online presence was minimal, and they were outranked by competitors in local searches.
localSeoCase.solution: We implemented a comprehensive local SEO strategy including Google Business Profile optimization, local citation building, review management, and location-specific content creation.
localSeoCase.results1: 500% increase in appointment bookings within 4 months
localSeoCase.results2: Top 3 rankings for all major local keywords
localSeoCase.results3: 300% improvement in website traffic from local searches
localSeoCase.results4: 4.9/5 average rating with over 120 new patient reviews
localSeoCase.testimonial: The local SEO campaign transformed our business. We're now booked weeks in advance and have had to hire additional staff to handle the growth. I highly recommend WebABC's local SEO services.
localSeoCase.imageAlt: Google Maps showing top ranking for dental clinic after local SEO optimization
localSeoCase.resultsImageAlt: Chart showing growth in local search visibility and appointment bookings after SEO implementation

webDevCase.title: React-based Financial Platform with 99.9% Uptime
webDevCase.challenge: A fintech startup needed a secure, scalable web application for financial data analysis and reporting, with strict requirements for performance and reliability.
webDevCase.solution: We developed a custom React-based web application with a Node.js backend, implementing advanced data visualization, real-time data processing, and bank-level security protocols.
webDevCase.results2: 90% faster data processing compared to previous solution
webDevCase.results3: Successfully passed external security audit with zero critical findings
webDevCase.results4: Scalable architecture supporting 10x user growth without performance degradation
webDevCase.testimonial: WebABC delivered a robust platform that has been crucial to our business growth. The attention to detail, especially around security and performance optimization, demonstrated their expertise in financial application development.
webDevCase.imageAlt: Dashboard interface of the React financial platform showing data visualization components
webDevCase.resultsImageAlt: Performance metrics showing system uptime and response time improvement after deployment
